value:
Praising my festival attire, are we?
I chose it myself. Such perfection.
I'm in awe of my impeccable style.

It's about time Askr had a festival to
celebrate my greatness. Bern does it
better, but this is a decent effort.

The epitome of beauty. The pillar
of wisdom. The embodiment of
springtime. In one word: Narcian.

My spirits are high. I shall permit
you to trail behind me at a respectful
distance as I survey my festivities.

How kind of you to hold this vernal
celebration in my honor. Mind you,
don't let this level of devotion wane.

You may ogle, but make way! I come
with springtime salutations to you
from $Nf.

Feast your eyes! You peasants are
blessed with spring because of ME!

I'll allow you to be more vocal
in your admiration!

Gaahh! Who disrespected Narcian?
I'll claw you, spineless coward!

Yes, shower me with gifts! I am the
reason for your spring celebrations!

I am Narcian—a Wyvern General of
Bern, and the guest of honor at this
spring festival. Bow your head!

I once saw you as a mediocre shell
of a being, unfit to lick my boots.$k$pBut you had a vision to crown me as
the guest of honor at this festival.
For that, I'll acknowledge you.$k$pAnd look around! Thanks to my
presence, the flowers bloom and the
air warms. People rejoice for ME.$k$pHeh heh, was there ever any doubt?
My strength, my wisdom, and, yes,
my beauty can never be questioned.$k$pBy all means, continue your revelry
in my honor! Make Narcian
synonymous with the Askr spring!
ええいっ
Perish!
ぎゃっ…！
What!?
It's spring, you fool!
Breathtaking, isn't it?
I'll tear you to shreds.
Hop for me!
I'll remember this!
Hehehe
What's all this, you ask? Vibrant spring garb befits one such as I.
*gasp* You dare besmirch my noble raiment? Stop with this nonsense!
I'd say the ears are quite charming, but do tell me what you think.
No matter what clothes I wear, my natural radiance cannot be concealed.
This world does seem to understand a suitable celebration! You have my compliments.
Rabbits are often hunted, but I am, of course, always the hunter. *laugh*
It is the season of life renewed, and yet you look so...limp. I suppose that's just how you are.
As I well know.
Are you sure about that?
A fresh spring breeze.
